item.title: DOJ investigating major egg producers amid soaring prices: Sources
item.description: The Justice Department is in the early stages of investigating the major egg producers over soaring egg prices, source familiar with the matter told A...

item.title: WATCH: Hockey great Alex Ovechkin making a difference
item.description: Alex Ovechkin, one of the greatest hockey players of all time, is approaching Wayne Gretzky's all-time record of 894 goals scored while playing for a ...

item.title: After 40 years on the run, escaped prisoner from Puerto Rico caught in Florida
item.description: A man who escaped a Puerto Rican prison nearly 40 years ago was taken into custody in Florida, according to the Lee County Sheriff's Office.

item.title: WATCH: How social media helped fuel a female mechanic's business
item.description: ABC News' Will Ganss is here with the story about Desiree Hill who found a massive online community when switching from nursing to auto work.

item.title: 12 injured in shooting at Toronto pub
item.description: At least 12 people have been injured in a shooting at a pub in Toronto on Friday night, police said.
